reviews.review: Игра супер, но очень  в последнее время много читаков

I must say that this game is  the best competitive fps shooting game i've ever played but this game also has its Cons for example
 1.  there are too many Hackers unless you have prime.
 2. this game takes patience because you are not gonna get good in couple of weeks you need a lot of determination and
 3. the community is a bit toxic but if you are having troubles of toxic teammates just mute them because they might put you off of your game

But nonetheless the game is very fun with your friends
This Game sucks but im still addicted!

Ruslar yüzünden oyun zevkim kalmadı lan,bi oyun oynatmıyolar ya bok gibi oynuyolar ya trollüyolar yeter ulan onamayın oyunu,rus çok oyun zevkinizin azına sıçıyolar,takım arakadaşını öldürüyolar bıktım lan!
This is a really good game.
FIX YOUR GAME GABEN FAT FUUUUUUUCCCCCKKK (edit 2021 still sucks)

It has become a worse game now. Every 2nd match I find a hacker who kills the whole squad by doing everything wall hack,aim bot etc.Even I also found a website where csgo hacks are uploaded daily. I dont know what is going on valve's mind but they are doing nothing about those hacks and ruining their master piece. GG
alot of hacks on this game ngl

Witam dzisiejszą recenzje pisze bo to już 2 konto które dostaje Vaka za nic. Jeśli tak wygląda gra która ma miliony zwolenników na całym świecie to moja ocena tej gry jest jasna 1/10 w meczu zrobiłem 20 kili i dziś dostałem vacka .
Manque a refaire le système de rank pour les compètes et le jeu excellera !
Игра нормально но иногда читеры заходят
попался тупой патруль дали бан. спасибо

Valve is banning random people on the free2play CSGO. I really dont know what is wrong with your anti cheat, but you ban just people without doing anything. Even though they are new players you banned for example a friend of mine, he played his first player versus player game, instantly got VAC-Banned. Better buy the game to get Prime, otherwise you will get banned without any reason

games okay but theres no point in paying for prime as its still insanely easy to buy prime accounts, whether it be casual/competitive you'll often run into hackers, advice is stick to mainly community servers or war games

Do not play this game.  It is slow, it is clunky, it is boring, and most of all, the userbase is toxic... really, really toxic.  

If you're wanting to play Counter-Strike, check out Source.  Is way better.
